long_description: A quality pair of socks can make all the difference on a long trek. The REI Classic Ragg socks have a timeless look and a comfortable merino wool/nylon/spandex fabric blend to keep your feet happy. Merino wool regulates heat, wicks moisture, and is soft, breathable and warm; nylon adds durabilty and spandex gives the socks a conforming fit. Reinforced heels and toes stand up to regular wear. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: A quality pair of socks can make all the difference on a long trek. The REI Classic Ragg socks have a timeless look and a comfortable merino wool/nylon/spandex fabric blend to keep your feet happy.
